channel.title: Tumeke Cycle Space
channel.description: Recent content on Tumeke Cycle Space

item.title: Bikes for Sale
item.description:
Bikes for Sale

We always have a wide range of styles and sizes of bikes for sale. All bikes we sell have been thoroughly safety checked to a comprehensive check list, lubed and serviced at Tumeke Cycle Space, and are ready to ride away.

You can also take a look at our range of bikes being made ready for sale, at our workshop.

Tumeke is open 12-4pm on Sundays. Come and see us for a test ride, or contact hello@tumekecyclespace.org.nz.

item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Frequently Asked Questions

What is Tumeke Cycle Space?

We’re a volunteer- run community bike workshop in the lovely suburb of Sandringham in central Tamaki Makaurau, Auckland. We’re not a professional bike repair shop – we have tools and expertise to help with lots of things, but we can’t do everything (please don’t come with your hydraulic brakes to repair!). As part of coming to Tumeke, you get to do the repair yourself, learning more about how your bike works and giving you the skills and confidence to fix things on your own.

item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description:
Upcoming Events

Drop-in weekly Sunday workshop

Our Sunday community workshop is open from 12-4pm, most weekends (not on public holidays – check our Facebook for updates).

We have tools and expertise to help with lots of things, but we can’t do everything. As part of coming to Tumeke, you get to do the repair yourself, learning more about how your bike works and giving you the skills and confidence to fix things on your own.

item.title: Volunteering
item.description:
Volunteer With Us

We’re always looking for new volunteers. If you’re looking for a way to contribute to Auckland’s cycling community, to learn more about how to fix your bike, and to meet some nice people, get in touch!
